text: Michel Ange-Charles Tognini (born September 30, 1949, in Vincennes, France) is a French test pilot, astronaut, educator, writer and administrator. Tognini is Head of the European Astronaut Centre (EAC) of the European Space Agency (ESA) in Cologne, Germany.Usa, Ibp. (2007). European Space Agency (ESA) Handbook, p. 35. Tognini graduated from the École de l'Air.Air Salon ==Awards and honors== * Medal of AeronauticsAssociation of Space Explorers, Michel Tognini ; retrieved 2012-7-10. * Chevalier de Ordre National du Mérite * Commander dans l'Ordre de la Légion d'Honneur * Soviet Order of Friendship between the People * Russian Order of Friendship between the People ==References== ==Other websites== *NASA biography of Tognini *Spacefacts biography of Tognini Category:1949 births Category:Living people Category:Astronauts Category:French aviators Category:Vincennes Category:People from Val-de-Marne
title: Michel Tognini
